mapper.select: SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.sale_price, n.origin_price, n.discount_rate, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.attach_name, a.main FROM jollygoods n JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name order by sale_q desc

SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.sale_price, n.origin_price, n.discount_rate, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.attach_name, a.main FROM jollygoods n JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name order by time desc

SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.sale_price, n.origin_price, n.discount_rate, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.attach_name, a.main FROM jollygoods n JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name order by n.sale_price asc

SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.sale_price, n.origin_price, n.discount_rate, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.attach_name, a.main FROM jollygoods n JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name where origin_price != 0

SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.sale_price,n.origin_price, n.discount_rate, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.attach_name, a.time, a.main FROM jollygoods n JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name where main_category = #{mainCategory} order by time desc

SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.sale_price, n.origin_price, n.discount_rate, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.attach_name, a.time, a.main FROM jollygoods n JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name where main_category = #{mainCategory} and sub_category = #{subCategory} order by time desc

SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.main_category, n.sub_category, n.sale_price, n.origin_price, n.sales_unit, n.volume, n.del_classification, n.packing_type, n.allergy, n.shelf_life, n.fileuploadpath, n.contents1, n.contents2, n.upload, a.num, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.main, a.attach_name FROM jollygoods n LEFT OUTER JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name where n.goods_name = #{attachName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jolly.jollygoods (goods_name, sub_goods, main_category, sub_category, sale_price, origin_price, discount_rate, sales_unit, volume, del_classification, packing_type, allergy, shelf_life, contents1, contents2, file_url, upload) VALUES (#{goodsName}, #{subGoods}, #{mainCategory}, #{subCategory}, #{salePrice}, #{originPrice}, #{discountRate}, #{salesUnit}, #{volume}, #{delClassification}, #{packingType}, #{allergy}, #{shelfLife}, #{contents1}, #{contents2}, #{fileUrl}, #{upload})

update.foreach: update jollygoods set sale_q = sale_q + #{basketVo.amount} where goods_name = #{basketVo.goodsName}

mapper.select: SELECT n.goods_name, n.sub_goods, n.sale_price,n.origin_price, n.discount_rate, a.uuid, a.filename1, a.uploadpath, a.image, a.attach_name, a.time, a.main FROM jollygoods n JOIN attach a ON n.goods_name = a.attach_name where goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsSearch}, '%') order by time desc
